scripts.package: bun run --filter @nebulr-group/bridge-react prepack && cd bridge-react && bun pm pack --destination ../
scripts.test:e2e: rm -rf node_modules/.bun 2>/dev/null; bun run e2e/playwright/pre-setup.ts test.local && PLAYWRIGHT_PROJECT_NAME=local bunx playwright test --project=local
scripts.test:e2e:stage: bun run e2e/playwright/pre-setup.ts test.stage && PLAYWRIGHT_PROJECT_NAME=stage bunx playwright test --project=stage
scripts.test:e2e:prod: bun run e2e/playwright/pre-setup.ts test.prod && PLAYWRIGHT_PROJECT_NAME=prod bunx playwright test --project=prod
scripts.test:e2e:headed: rm -rf node_modules/.bun 2>/dev/null; bun run e2e/playwright/pre-setup.ts test.local && PLAYWRIGHT_PROJECT_NAME=local PLAYWRIGHT_HEADED=true bunx playwright test --project=local
